title: Hell's King
description: In order to be king, Lucifer has to die...The Antichrist is supposed to rule the world, but Chris kind of promised the ghost of his father-in-law he’d rather have the love of his wife.And he meant it…at the time.However, Chris was born with a destiny. He is the prince-in-waiting. The destroyer of nations.A failure with no magic, no armies, and no longer even a psychotic mother he can call upon.Is he destined for a mundane life?Good thing fate has other plans. Plans that include him becoming Hell’s King.
author: Eve Langlais
